definition: CPPCC (Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference)/abbr. of 中國人民政治協商會議|中国人民政治协商会议[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4]
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

sentences.english: This will disappoint Pan Qinglin, a member of the consultative committee that advises China's government.
sentences.chinese: 这必然会使政协委员潘庆林感到失望。

sentences.english: Tanggu District, Vice Chairman of CPPCC Yang Zhigang attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 塘沽区政协副主席杨志刚出席会议。

sentences.english: CPPCC National Committee Chairman Jia Qinglin delivered a keynote report after the session started at 3 pm.
sentences.chinese: 政协主席贾庆林在会议开始后发表了重要讲话。

sentences.english: The forth chapter analyses the problems and reason that exists in political democracy supervision.
sentences.chinese: 第四章分析了政协民主监督存在的问题及原因。

sentences.english: Fu Kecheng, chairperson of Jiangxi Political Consultative Conference and Board chairman Zheng Yuanbao.
sentences.chinese: 江西省政协主席傅克诚与郑元豹董事长合影留念。

sentences.english: The theoretic base of the people's political conference is the people's democracy.
sentences.chinese: 人民政协的理论基础是人民民主。

sentences.english: Proposals are the major carriers for the CPPCC to perform its basic roles.
sentences.chinese: 提案是人民政协履行基本职能的主要载体。

sentences.english: Word of this follows earlier proposals from political advisors, calling on the government to relax the policy.
sentences.chinese: 这来自政协委员们的早些建议，呼吁政府放宽政策。

sentences.english: Luo Fuhe, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC), attended the reception.
sentences.chinese: 全国政协副主席罗富和出席了此次招待会。

sentences.english: The National CPPCC and its counterparts in some provinces and municipalities have also established committees for women and youth.
sentences.chinese: 全国政协及部分盛市政协还设立了妇女青年委员会。

sentences.english: The National CPPCC and its counterparts in some provinces and municipalities have also established committees for women and youth.
sentences.chinese: 全国政协及部分盛市政协还设立了妇女青年委员会。

sentences.english: He said that the CPPCC shares traditional friendly relations with the ROK National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 他说，中国全国政协与韩国国会有着传统友好关系。

sentences.english: This will disappoint Pan Qinglin, a member of the consultative committee that advises China’s government.
sentences.chinese: 政协委员潘庆林对此感到失望。

sentences.english: Chief Executive Tung Chee-hwa was yesterday appointed as a delegate to the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.
sentences.chinese: 特首董建华昨日获委任为全国政协的港区委员。

sentences.english: Dong Zhaoli presented the report on the work of the standing committee of the 12th CPPCC Municipal Committee.
sentences.chinese: 董昭礼作市政协第十二届委员会常务委员会工作报告。

sentences.english: The photo shows Vice-Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee Luo and attended the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 图为全国政协副主席罗富和出席开幕式。
